#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long dp[501][10][1024];
#define mod 1000000007
int main(){
int t,n,m;
for(int i=0;i<=9;i++)
    dp[1][i][1<<i] = 1;
for(int i=2;i<=500;i++){
    for(int j=0;j<=9;j++){
        if(j==0){
            for(int k=0;k<1024;k++){
                dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)] += dp[i-1][j+1][k];
                if(dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]>=mod)
                    dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]%=mod;
            }
        }
        else if(j==9){
            for(int k=0;k<1024;k++){
                dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)] += dp[i-1][j-1][k];
                if(dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]>=mod)
                    dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]%=mod;
            }
        }
        else{
            for(int k=0;k<1024;k++){
                dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)] += dp[i-1][j-1][k];
                if(dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]>=mod)
                    dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]%=mod;
                dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)] += dp[i-1][j+1][k];
                if(dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]>=mod)
                    dp[i][j][k|(1<<j)]%=mod;
            }
        }
    }
}
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
 scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
 long long int sum = 0;
 int mask = 0;
 for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    mask |= (1<<i);
 for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){
    for(int j=1;j<=9;j++){
        sum=(sum+dp[i][j][mask])%mod;
    }
 }
 printf("%lld\n",sum);
}
return 0;
}
